articles.title: Panic! At the Disco Reflect on Fame and Vegas Roots on New Song ‘Viva Las Vengeance’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Band has announced a new album with the same name, and a North American tour this fall
articles.content:
Panic! At the Disco have returned with a new song, “Viva Las Vengeance,” the title-track from their upcoming seventh studio album, out Aug. 19 via Fueled b Ramen/DCD2 Records.
